amendment.description: To allow the Secretary of Defense to request an extension to report financial and payment information data.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2971 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2971 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Carper to Amendment SA 2970.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2971 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Carper to Amendment SA 2970.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2971 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
